body_html: Hey @jtoy . It is early stage. While we're awaiting applications from students to develop the Ruby tensorflow API, we're also researching into the best ways to do this. Our first steps would be to enable people to create a tensorflow graph using constants (scalar, matrices), and operations (add, multiply, etc.). Something along the lines of https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.7/get_started/basic_usage.html#basic-usage
